title: resume

title: sleep-debt-tracker
description: Sleep Debt Tracker is a project built with TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML to help users visualize and manage their sleep debt. This application aims to provide insights into sleep patterns and promote healthier sleep habits. Using a clean and intuitive interface, users can track their sleep schedule, identify potential sleep deficits, and ultimately improve their overall well-being. This repository serves as a practical application of TypeScript in a real-world project.

title: NextJs-Dashboard

This repository serves as a practical example for building interactive user interfaces and showcases best practices for structuring Next.js applications, providing a foundation for data visualization and user management features within a clean and maintainable architecture.

title: ros-log-viewer
description: ros-log-viewer is a web-based tool for visualizing and analyzing ROS (Robot Operating System) log files. Built with JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and Shell scripts, this project provides a user-friendly interface to parse, filter, and display ROS log data, enabling developers to efficiently debug and understand their robotic systems. It's designed to improve ROS development workflows by offering a clear and interactive presentation of log information.

title: robofleet-dashboard
description: The robofleet-dashboard repository hosts a web application built with JavaScript, Python, HTML, and CSS, designed as a project to visualize and interact with data from a Robofleet system. This dashboard provides a user-friendly interface for monitoring robot status, sensor data, and other key metrics, offering valuable insights into robot operations.

title: dynamic-event-calendar
description: dynamic-event-calendar is a project showcasing a responsive and interactive event calendar built using JavaScript, CSS, and HTML. It provides a dynamic interface for viewing and managing events, allowing users to easily navigate through dates and see scheduled activities. This project demonstrates front-end development skills and offers a practical example of how to create a user-friendly calendar interface.

title: iot-asset-tracking
description: This project is a modern IoT asset tracking application built with Next.js, TypeScript, and styled with Tailwind CSS. It leverages Supabase for database management and authentication, providing a robust platform for monitoring and managing assets in real-time. Key features include [Assuming from typical asset tracking apps: location tracking, data visualization, user authentication]. title: genietalks
description: GenieTalks is a web application built with TypeScript, Vite.js, and Express.js that leverages the Gemini API for interactive and engaging conversations. This project explores the capabilities of large language models within a modern web framework, showcasing features powered by the Gemini API and styled with CSS and JavaScript to provide a user-friendly experience.

title: next-idea-board
description: Next-idea-board is a project built with TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, functioning as a digital idea board to help users brainstorm and organize thoughts. This personal project leverages modern web technologies to provide a clean and intuitive interface for capturing and visualizing ideas, making it a useful tool for individual brainstorming sessions and collaborative project planning.

title: devboard
description: Devboard is a full-stack project template built with Next.js 14 (using the pages router), TypeScript, and Material UI (MUI), providing a robust foundation for rapidly developing web applications. This repository leverages React Query for efficient data fetching and management, offering a structured approach to building scalable and maintainable applications while adhering to best practices in modern web development. The project showcases a pre-configured development environment equipped with common features and utilities, enabling developers to focus on core application logic rather than initial setup.

title: Map-Visualisation
description: This repository, built using HTML and Python, focuses on creating dynamic map visualizations. It represents a project exploring different methods of data representation on geographical maps, likely incorporating libraries such as Folium or similar to generate interactive and informative map-based visualisations. The project demonstrates practical application of web technologies for data visualization and geographical data handling.

title: jovian
description: Jovian is a CRUD application built with Flask, PostgreSQL, and Python for managing data, focusing on demonstrating a functional project with these technologies. It leverages HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting for front-end presentation and deployment, and serves as a practical example for learning and implementing Python-based web applications with database interaction.

title: finance-with-python
description: This repository, built with Jupyter Notebook and Python, houses a collection of projects exploring financial analysis and modeling. It covers various finance-related topics, providing practical examples and code implementations for learning and experimentation. The repository aims to demonstrate how Python can be effectively used for tackling real-world financial challenges.

title: next-voting
description: Next-voting is a modern, user-friendly voting platform built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript. This project leverages cutting-edge web technologies to provide a seamless and secure experience for creating and participating in polls, focusing on clean design and efficient performance. It explores practical applications of TypeScript within a React environment, aiming to be a robust and easily customizable voting solution.

title: fruit-seller
description: Fruit-Seller is a full-stack e-commerce project built with Next.js 14 using the Pages Router, TypeScript, and leveraging MUI for a responsive user interface. It utilizes React Query for efficient data fetching and management, focusing on type safety and best practices for building scalable web applications.
